# Google Accounts versus Google Apps for your domain for Single Sigon On to salesforce

= Google Accounts versus Google Apps for your domain =

*Salesforce Single Sign On with Delegated Authentication using Google App Engine* was built and tested against a _Google Accounts_ not _Google Apps for your domain_

It does not mean it wouldn't necessarily work it just not been tested or configured due to lack of access to Google Apps.

= Details =

Instructions on how to assign a Google App Engine application to Google Apps for your domain can be found 

[http://code.google.com/appengine/articles/domains.html Deploying your Application on your Google Apps URL]
